Name: 2001 A Space Odyssey
Quote 1: I'm sorry, Dave. I'm afraid I can't do that.

Name: Aliens

You ever feel like you're just alive?"

Hallelujah! Holy shit. Where's the Tylenol?"

A touch O'Blarney... a heap O'Magic and A LOAD O'LAUGHTER!"

column5: There is no right and wrong. There's only fun and boring.
